issue.title: Finalize how to log command output for multi-scripts

content.raw: Current way works well. Each file does not need to be appended to, just written to once. Each team’s trial has its own file. Each team WAMV creation has its own file. Each task yaml has its own file. [https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22380733/how-to-write-a-text-file-with-color](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22380733/how-to-write-a-text-file-with-color) use `less <filename>` to see it with color. They are organized into `multi_scripts/run_output` and `multi_scripts/prepare_output`
content.html: Current way works well. Each file does not need to be appended to, just written to once. Each team’s trial has its own file. Each team WAMV creation has its own file. Each task yaml has its own file. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22380733/how-to-write-a-text-file-with-color use less <filename> to see it with color. They are organized into multi_scripts/run_output and multi_scripts/prepare_output
